title: Things not picked up from packages.yaml
body:
## Problem 1

In packages.yaml, i have:

```
    python:
        version: [3.5.1]
```

And yet, the following does not pick it up:

```
$ spack spec py-cython
  py-cython@0.23.4%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
      ^python@2.7.11%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
          ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
          ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
          ^openssl@system%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
          ^readline@6.3%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
          ^sqlite@3.8.5%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
          ^zlib@1.2.8%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
```

Instead, I have to say `spack spec py-cython ^python@3:`.
## Problem 2

I also have in `packages.yaml`:

```
    all:
        providers:
            blas: [atlas]
            lapack: [atlas]
```

However, `spack spec py-numpy ^python@3:` does not pick that up either:

```
  py-numpy@1.10.4%gcc@4.9.3+blas+lapack=linux-x86_64
      ^openblas@0.2.17%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
      ^py-nose@1.3.6%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
          ^py-setuptools@19.2%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
              ^python@3.5.1%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
                  ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
                  ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
                  ^openssl@system%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
                  ^readline@6.3%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
                  ^sqlite@3.8.5%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
                  ^zlib@1.2.8%gcc@4.9.3=linux-x86_64
```

To get atlas, I have to say `spack spec py-numpy +blas+lapack ^python@3: ^atlas`
